thread.title: Uhm Ki Joon Is A Cutie Pie Behind The Scenes Of "Defendant" | Soompi
thread.title_full: Uhm Ki Joon Is A Cutie Pie Behind The Scenes Of "Defendant" | Soompi

author: U. Kim
title: Uhm Ki Joon Is A Cutie Pie Behind The Scenes Of "Defendant" | Soompi
text:
Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
On February 21, Sidus HQ revealed behind-the-scenes cuts of Uhm Ki Joon filming for “ Defendant .” 
Uhm Ki Joon plays the role of Cha Min Ho, an evil man who is willing to take any measures to get what he wants. His sinister acting sends chills down viewers’ spines every episode. 
Off screen, he makes a complete turn from his villainous role and shows his cute side by making a “V” sign and sending finger hearts at the camera. What’s more, according to reports, the “Defendant” staff are calling him the official cutie at the filming site, thanks to his jokes and adorable facial expressions. 
Meanwhile, on the previous episode of “Defendant,” Jung Woo ( Ji Sung ) and Min Ho (Uhm Ki Joon) displayed strong tension as they started sharing the same prison cell. 
“Defendant” airs every Monday and Tuesday. Watch it exclusively on Viki !
